A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was unfortunately bad. I tried my best to like it because I love Star Wars. This is not your typical Star Wars story\, which would have been fine had there actually been a story. Rather the movie is full of cliche's\, ex-machina's\, and failed call backs. There were quite a few surprises and twist that I had not expected\, but they were hard to enjoy because of all the jumping back and forth to unimportant storylines and cuts. I really enjoyed the Kylo Ren/Rey conflict\, and wish more emphasis had been placed on developing them and their conflicts within and with each other. Unfortunately too much time was given to the other 4 non-plot driving side characters. overall as a movie it's fine\, similar to a marvel movie\, as Star Wars\, extremely disappointing.
